about_the_game:
About the Game


Popular high school girl Lita finds herself trapped in a strange dreamlike world.
She needs to escape from a dangerous, eerie castle with the help of her mysterious ally, Ian.

Features

2D Exploration Adventure
Solve puzzles and investigate to progress the story.
Accessible Gameplay
Immersive Narrative
4 Different Endings

-------------------------------------------------- --------------------
Distribution Guidelines for Gameplay Videos
When publishing videos or live streaming, if you post the following rights notation and store page link in the summary column, we will grant permission regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation.

Rights notation: ©2023 Sodi All rights reserved.

name: Lita's Dream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/9
  • Processor: AMD Processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon(TM) Vega 8 Graphics
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window11
  • Processor: AMD Processor
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon(TM) Vega 8 Graphics
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
